text: The 2018–19 season of Clube Recreativo e Desportivo do Libolo is the club's 14th season in Angolan football, and the 12th consecutive season in the Girabola, the top flight of Angolan football. In 2018, the club is participating in the Girabola and the Angola Cup. == Squad Information== === Players === {| class="wikitable ve-ce-branchNode ve-ce-tableNode" !No. !Nat !Nick !Name !Pos !Date of Birth (Age) |- !
